alain changed some stuff on friday that was missed, and I just checking a few
more changes relating to open type hierarchy disabling.

marking as fixed, but I wont change the milestone unless we as doing another RC
build...

Do we want to include this in 3.0? or are we O.K. with leaving this exception in
the log? I'm fine with doing another build.

(In reply to comment #2)
> Do we want to include this in 3.0? or are we O.K. with leaving this exception in
> the log? I'm fine with doing another build.

I'd say go for another build.

James I do not think we will need to run the sanity tests again on this new build
your results, should carry over, IMHO.

I can see already lots of PR being created because of the exception log entry.

I would say we go for another build since the command "open.type.hierarchy" can 
be seen in c-editor context menu in current build. It won't prolong our release 
schedule because considering it's a low risk fix, I don't have to repeat the 
tests I have done, as Alain suggested.

O.K. I've asked the community for approval (or lack of objection) and will kick
off the rebuild tonight if so approved.
